divs: sighting detailsi was taking videos of aircraft departing and landing at phnl honolulu int'l airport. the sun was bright and i could not see my view finder lcd screen clearly. only upon close inspection of the video clips while editing using sony vegas for upload to youtube did i notice the blue discs. at first i thought is was a weird cloud, but you can clearly see the disc's shape. they appear in two different video clips, and in one clip the objects are moving left to right. if i had seen the object during the filming i would have continued to track them. the clips were taken 5\8\08 approximately at 1230 pm. they are totally unedited.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Honolulu
There were no other sightings in Honolulu on or around May 8th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
